## PickPrefixed type

Constructs a type by picking the set of properties with prefix specified by `TPrefix` (string literal) from `TProps`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PickPrefixed<TProps, TPrefix> = {
    [TKey in keyof TProps as UnprefixedKey<TKey, TPrefix>]: TProps[TKey];
};
```
**References:** [UnprefixedKey](./use-prefixed-props.unprefixedkey.md)

## Example


```ts
 type Props = { foo: unknown, "foo-bar": unknown }

 type FooProps = PickPrefixed<Props, "foo">
 // { bar: unknown }
```
